resources.string: Destacar casas do tabuleiro (último movimento e xeque)
Destino das peças (movimentos válidos e pré-movimentos)

string.name: boardCoordinates
string.comment:
boardCoordinates
Coordinates are always the Latin A-H.

resources.string: Lista de movimentos durante a partida
Mostrar cursor de redimensionamento do tabuleiro

string.name: whenTimeRemainingLessThanTenSeconds
string.comment:
whenTimeRemainingLessThanTenSeconds
The < symbol is not required (you can write it as a word), just do NOT use < in its place.

resources.string: Pré-movimentos (jogadas durante o turno do oponente)

string.name: claimDrawOnThreefoldRepetitionAutomatically
string.comment:
claimDrawOnThreefoldRepetitionAutomatically
Please remember that "threefold repetition" is not a repetition of moves, but a repetition of positions.

resources.string: Reivindicar empate sobre a repetição tripla automaticamente

string.name: whenTimeRemainingLessThanThirtySeconds
string.comment:
whenTimeRemainingLessThanThirtySeconds
The < symbol is not required (you can write it as a word), just do NOT use < in its place.

resources.string: Confirmar abandono e oferta de empate
Mova o Rei em direção a torre
Inclua os lances com o teclado
